universum.studios.websocket.adapter

Class WebSocketAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Socket
      • universum.studios.websocket.adapter.WebSocketAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class WebSocketAdapter
extends Socket
    A Socket implementation which may be used in order to adapt an asynchronous nature of a concrete WebSocket implementation into synchronous nature of raw Socket. WebSocketAdapter requires a concrete WebSocket implementation to be represented by WebSocketDelegate interface with which instance may be web socket adapter instantiated via WebSocketAdapter(WebSocketDelegate) constructor. The adapter is then delegating all appropriate calls to the delegate instance, like sending of frames, and is also listening for the appropriate callbacks, like receiving frames.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

      Creates a new instance of WebSocketAdapter with the specified WebSocket delegate to be adapted into synchronous nature of Socket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebSocketAdapter

        public WebSocketAdapter(WebSocketDelegate delegate)
        Creates a new instance of WebSocketAdapter with the specified WebSocket delegate to be adapted into synchronous nature of Socket.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate that hides a concrete implementation of a WebSocket. The adapter will delegate all appropriate calls to the delegate and also will listen for all appropriate callbacks to properly satisfy Socket implementation.
